scan_table_check.description: A role should never be assigned directly to a user. Instead roles should be assigned to groups so users that are members of such groups will inherit these roles. Exceptions are technical users and test users. If roles are assigned to users directly this may cause intransparency and confusion. Access rights are more difficult to maintain and to audit.
scan_table_check.name: DataSanity - Roles assigned directly to users
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Roles should be revoked from users and instead users should be assigned to groups that contain these required roles.
scan_table_check.short_description: Roles should not be assigned directly to users.
scan_table_check.sys_name: DataSanity - Roles assigned directly to users
